summary:
adds 3 new sets of armor to the game, All 3 sets include 3x versions of the chest piece. 
one with no added shoulders
one with the spike shoulders
one with a new shoulders

All 3 versions, light, heavy and cloth, have male and female models, so the armor is not limited to one or the other.
descriptionHtml:
ALSO AVAILABLE ON STEAM

adds 3 new sets of armor to the game, All 3 sets include 3x versions of the chest piece. 
one with no added shoulders
one with the spike shoulders
one with a new shoulders

All 3 versions, light, heavy and cloth, have male and female models, so the armor is not limited to one or the other.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fixes:......
added a second version of the cloth set without the enchants
added two versions of a shield... one with spikes, and one without. there is also a light and heavy version of both
added a ring to match the set
added an Amulet to match the set
added a Circlet that can be used in the place of the hood. but the circlet has no armor value
removed the 1st person setting on the chest pieces

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cloth set - Realmshatter Clothes - craftable in the leather perk - This set has 0 armor value, But it has the Arch-mage sets enchants. the materials needed are close to all the other sets but a lot cheaper to make. This version is not upgradable because it is set as clothing

Realmshatter Boots - EnchArmorResistShock06
Realmshatter Hood - MGarchmagerobehoodenchant
Realmshatter Ciurass - MGarchmagerobeenchant
Realmshatter Gloves - (un-enchanted) add what you want.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Light set - Realmshatter Armor - craftable in the glass perk - armor values are slightly higher then Dragonscale armor, and the weight reduced.

Materials needed: (light armor set)
Glass armor set
Daedric Hearts
Dragon scales
Horker Tusks
Gold ingots
Leather straps

Base stat comparison: (vanilla)
Glass Armor set - Armor value 76, weight value 13
Dragonscale Armor set - Armor value 82, weight value 20
Realmshatter Armor set - Armor value 109, weight value 14

Individual Armor pieces:
Glass Boots - armor value 11, weight value 2
Dragonscale Boots - armor value 12, weight value 3
Realmshatter Boots - armor value 18, weight value 1

Glass Cuirass - armor value 38, weight value 7
Dragonscale Cuirass - armor value 41, weight value 10
Realmshatter Ciurass - armor value 48, weight value 7

Glass Gauntlets - armor value 11, weight value 2
Dragonscale Gloves - armor value 12, weight value 3
Realmshatter Gloves - armor value 21, weight value 2

Glass helm - armor value 16, weight value 2
Dragonscale helm - armor value 17, weight value 4
Realmshatter Hood - armor value 22, weight value 2

(NEW) shield
Glass Shield - armor value 27.00, weight value 6.00
Dragonscale Shield - armor value 29.00, weight value 6.00
Realmshatter Shield - armor value 31.00, weight value 5.00
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Heavy set - Realmshatter Armor - craftable in the Daedric perk - armor values are slightly higher then Daedric armor, and the weight reduced.

Materials needed: (heavy armor set)
Daedric armor set
Dragon bones
Horker tusks
Ebon ingots
Leather straps

Base stat comparison: (vanilla)
Dragonplate Armor set - armor value 102, weight value 64
Daedric Armor set - armor value 108, weight value 81
Realmshatter Armor set - armor value 127, weight value 50

Individual Armor pieces:
Dragonplate Boots - armor value 17, weight value 8
Daedric Boots - armor value 18, weight value 10
Realmshatter Boots - armor value 22, weight value 8

Dragonplate Cuirass - armor value 46, weight value 40
Daedric Cuirass - armor value 49, weight value 50
Realmshatter Cuirass - armor value 55, weight value 28

Dragonplate Gauntlets - armor value 17, weight value 8
Daedric Gauntlets - armor value 18, weight value 6
Realmshatter Gloves - armor value 22, weight value 4

Dragonplate Helm - armor value 22, weight value 8
Daedric Helm - armor value 23, weight value 15
Realmshatter Hood - armor value 28, weight value 10

(NEW) shield
Dragonplate shield - armor value 34.00, weight value 15.00
Daedric shield - armor value 36.00, weight value 15.00
Realmshatter Shield - armor value 38.00, weight value 12.00
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

both Light and Heavy sets can be upgraded to legendary on the work bench

programs used:
3ds max 11
Adobe Photoshop Elements 10
Coral Paintshop Pro
Nifscope
FO3 Archive tool

please post any feedback here if you find any issues with this mod. And if you love my work please let me know and endorse this if you want to.

I usually broadcast a live stream when im working on my mods if anyone is interested.
I use xsplit with Ustream here is the link to my channel
http://www.ustream.tv/channel/jena-s-3d-graphic-design
author: Jena Angela
